Object.Field:
COMPONENT NAME: IKM Teradata to File (TTU) COMPONENT VERSION: 10.1.3.2 AUTHOR: Oracle COMPATIBILITY: ODI 10.1.3.5.0 and above
DESCRIPTION Integration from a Teradata staging area to a file using FastExport or ParallelTransporter utility. This KM executes the following steps: 1. Generates the export script (fastexport) 2. Unloads the data in the target file by using fastexport utility 3. Removes the temporary data files created (if specified with the DEL_TEMP_FILES option) Additional information can be found in the Teradata FastExport Reference documentation.
REQUIREMENTS The host of the ODI Agent running the job must have the Teradata Client Utilities installed (fastexport).
BASIC CONFIGURATION - Make sure that the Data Server checkbox is checked in your Topology for the Teradata Technology and specify your Teradata server host in the Server field of your Data Server definition. To do that: 1. Edit the "Teradata" Technology definition in the Topology 2. Check the Naming Rules -> Using "Data Server" checkbox 3. Used Term : "Server" 4. Apply your changes 5. Edit your Teradata Dataserver definiton 6. In the Server field, enter the IP name of your Teradata Server (without "COPn") - To use this KM, you have to set the staging area to a different location than the target by selecting the a logical schema (Teradata Technology) in the definition tab of the interface ("Staging Area Different From Target" check box). Typically the logical schema of the source is used.
OPTIONS (Refer to Option descriptions for more information on each option) - LOGTABLE: Name of fastexport log table - SESSIONS: min and or max number of parallel FastExport sessions - VALIDATE: Validate KM options? - TERADATA_UTILITY: Use FastExport or TPT for unloading? - DEL_TEMP_FILES: Remove temporary files after execution?
LIMITATIONS - When using FastExport: Delimited records will always have maximum possible records length. Records are padded with blanks at the end due to FastExport limitations (No FORMAT VARTEXT availble). This does not apply to TPT. - Physical length of all target columns need to be set. - Fixed length files must not have any gaps between two columns. The end of col (n-1) needs to be directly followed by the beginning of col (n). - All target columns need to be mapped. - Only source data types String (includes Timestamps), Numeric and Date supported - Date and Timestamp formats need to be specified on target columns in ODI COL_FORMAT field. Please refer to Java Help for details on format syntax. E.g. "dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss" for Timestamp. - Following date and timestamp format translations supported: Java Teradata Note "y" "Y" Year, supported: yyyy;yy => 1996;96 "M" "M" Month, supported: MMMM;MMM;MM => July;Jul;07 "DDD" "DDD" Day in year "dd" "DD" Day in month "a" "T" Am/pm marker "H" "H" Hour in day (0-23) "K" "H" Hour in day (0-11) "mm" "MI" Minute in hour "ss" "SS2 Second in minute "SSS" "S(F)" Millisecond in second "z" "Z" Timezone "Z" "Z" Timezone " " "B" Blank - Following numeric format translations supported: Java Teradata Note "0" "9" Digit "#" "Z" Digit, zero shows as absent "." "D" Decimal separator "-" "-" Minus sign "," "G" Grouping separator "E" "E" Separates mantissa & exponent in scientific notation " " "B" Blank - Following D ataStore information is ignored: heading (not suported by FastExport), record separator (automatically chosen by TTU), text delimiter (not supported by TTU), decimal separator (automatically chosen by TTU/SDF)
Enter a name for the fastexport log table

This option generates an extra validation step during development. Validations performed are: - are all target columns mapped? - is physical length information set for all target columns?
This option should be turned off for all production use in particular for high-frequency execution. There is not added value in production, only processing overhead.

Choose the TERADATA_UTILITY to load data choose: FEXP to use fastexport utility TPT to use parallel transporter utility
For details and appropriate choice of utility, see Teradata documentation: FEXP Teradata FastExport Reference TPT Teradata Parallel Transporter Reference
Uncheck this option if you want to keep the temporary TTU script after integration
# Delete script try: os.remove(scriptname) finally: pass

<?

package com.oracle.odi.ext;

public class FormatTranslator {
	// Java Number Formatting information available at http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.4.2/docs/api/java/text/DecimalFormat.html
	// Java Date Formatting information available at http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.4.2/docs/api/java/text/SimpleDateFormat.html
	// Teradata Number Formatting information available in Teradata SQL Reference: Chapter "Output Format Phrases": FORMAT phrases and NUMERIC formats
	// Teradata Date Formatting information available in Teradata SQL Reference: Chapter "Output Format Phrases": FORMAT phrases and DateTime formats
	
	static String[][] transTableDate = {
	    {"y",		"Y"},	// Year, supported:  yyyy;yy => 1996;96
	    {"M",		"M"},	// Month, supported: MMMM;MMM;MM => July;Jul;07
	    {"DDD",		"DDD"},	// Day in year 
	    {"dd",		"DD"},	// Day in month
	    {"a",		"T"},	// Am/pm marker 
	    {"H",		"H"},	// Hour in day (0-23)
	    {"K",		"H"},	// Hour in day (0-11)
	    {"mm",		"MI"},	// Minute in hour 
	    {"ss",		"SS"},	// Second in minute 
	    {"SSS",		"S(F)"},// Millisecond in second 
	    {"z",		"Z"},	// Timezone
	    {"Z",		"Z"},	// Timezone
	    {" ",		"B"}	// Blank
	};
	
	static String[][] transTableNumber = {
		{"0",	"9"},	// Digit
		{"#",	"Z"}, 	// Digit, zero shows as absent
		{"\\.",	"D"},	// Decimal separator
		{"-",	"-"},	// Minus sign
		{",",	"G"},	// Grouping separator
		{"E",	"E"},	// Separates mantissa and exponent in scientific notation			    
	    {" ",	"B"}	// Blank
	};
	   

	public static String translate(String begin, String srcDT, String colFormat, String end) throws Exception {
		String format = "";
		
		if (colFormat.trim().length()==0) 
			/* we use Teradata's default format */
			format = "";
		else {
			// Is source column a date?
			if ( srcDT.toUpperCase().equals( "DATE") ) {
				format = colFormat;
				for (int i = 0; i < transTableDate.length; i++)
					format = format.replaceAll( transTableDate[i][0], transTableDate[i][1] );
			} else 
			// Is source column a numeric?
			if ( srcDT.toUpperCase().equals( "NUMERIC")) {
				format = colFormat;
				for (int i = 0; i < transTableNumber.length; i++)
					format = format.replaceAll( transTableNumber[i][0], transTableNumber[i][1] );
			} else 
			// Is source column anything else than a string?
			if ( !srcDT.toUpperCase().equals( "STRING" )) 
				throw new Exception("No format translation defined for data type "+srcDT+"!"); 
		};
		if ( format.length() > 0 )
			format = begin + format + end;
		return format;
	}

}

?>SnpsOutFile "-FILE=<%=odiRef.getTargetTable("WORK_SCHEMA")%>/<%=odiRef.getTargetTable("RES_NAME")%>.script"
<% if (odiRef.getOption("TERADATA_UTILITY").equals("FEXP")) {

/********************************************************************************/ 
/* FastExport Script 				*/ 
/********************************************************************************/ %>

      
.LOGTABLE <%=odiRef.getInfo("SRC_WORK_SCHEMA")%>.<%=odiRef.getOption("LOGTABLE")%>;      
.LOGON <%=odiRef.getInfo("SRC_DSERV_NAME")%>/<%=odiRef.getInfo("SRC_USER_NAME")%>,<%=odiRef.getInfo("SRC_PASS")%>;      
      
.BEGIN EXPORT      
   SESSIONS <%=odiRef.getOption("SESSIONS")%>;      
      
.EXPORT OUTFILE '<%=odiRef.getTable("L", "TARG_NAME", "A")%>'
   FORMAT TEXT
   MODE RECORD;      
      
SELECT <%=odiRef.getPop("DISTINCT_ROWS") %>

<%if (odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_FORMAT]", "", "", "INS").trim().equals("")) {%>
 <%if (odiRef.getTargetTable("FILE_FORMAT").equals("F")) {%>
   <%=odiRef.getColList("", "\t[EXPRESSION] (char([BYTES]))", ",\n", "", "INS") %>      
 <%} else {%>
   <%=odiRef.getColList("", "\t[EXPRESSION] (char([BYTES]))", ",\n\t'"+odiRef.getTargetTable("SFILE_SEP_FIELD")+"' (char("+odiRef.getTargetTable("SFILE_SEP_FIELD").length()+")),\n", "", "INS") %>      
 <%}%>
<%} else {%>
 <%if (odiRef.getTargetTable("FILE_FORMAT").equals("F")) {%>

   <%=odiRef.getColList("", "\t[EXPRESSION]\t<?=FormatTranslator.translate(\u0022(FORMAT '\u0022, \u0022[DEST_DT]\u0022, \u0022[COL_FORMAT]\u0022.trim(), \u0022')\u0022)?> (char([BYTES]))", ",\n", "", "INS") %>      
 <%} else {%>
   <%=odiRef.getColList("", "\t([EXPRESSION]\t<?=FormatTranslator.translate(\u0022 (FORMAT '\u0022, \u0022[DEST_DT]\u0022, \u0022[COL_FORMAT]\u0022.trim(), \u0022')\u0022)?>\t(varchar([BYTES])))", " ||\n\t('"+odiRef.getTargetTable("SFILE_SEP_FIELD")+"' (char("+odiRef.getTargetTable("SFILE_SEP_FIELD").length()+"))) ||\n", "", "INS") %> 
	(char(<%=odiRef.getColList("<?=", "[BYTES]", "+"+odiRef.getTargetTable("SFILE_SEP_FIELD").length()+"+", "?>", "INS")%>))
 <%}%>
<%}%>
     
FROM <%=odiRef.getFrom() %>    
<% {s="where	(1=1)";
s+=(char)10+odiRef.getJoin();
s+=(char)10+odiRef.getFilter();
s+=(char)10+odiRef.getJrnFilter();
/* For Performance: suppress where clause, if empty */ 
if (!s.trim().equals("where	(1=1)")) {out.print(s);}; };%>
<%=odiRef.getGrpBy() %>      
<%=odiRef.getHaving() %>       
;       
      
.END EXPORT;      
.LOGOFF;
<%}%>
<% if (odiRef.getOption("TERADATA_UTILITY").equals("TPT")) {

/********************************************************************************/ 
/* TPT Script	 				*/ 
/********************************************************************************/ %>


DEFINE JOB ODIExportODILoad<%=odiRef.getStep("SESS_NO")%>
DESCRIPTION 'ODI step name: <%=odiRef.getStep("STEP_NAME")%> ODI step #:<%=odiRef.getStep("NNO")%> from session #<%=odiRef.getStep("SESS_NO")%>'
(
DEFINE SCHEMA TargetFile
DESCRIPTION 'TargetFile'
(
<%if (odiRef.getTargetTable("FILE_FORMAT").equals("F")) {
	%><%=odiRef.getColList("", "\t[COL_NAME] CHAR([BYTES])", ",\n", "", "")%>
<%} else { 
	%><%=odiRef.getColList("", "\t[COL_NAME] VARCHAR([BYTES])", ",\n", "", "")%>
<%};%>
);
DEFINE OPERATOR FileWriter
DESCRIPTION 'TERADATA PARALLEL TRANSPORTER DATA CONNECTOR OPERATOR'
TYPE DATACONNECTOR CONSUMER
SCHEMA TargetFile
ATTRIBUTES
(
	VARCHAR PrivateLogName,
	VARCHAR FileName = '<%=odiRef.getTable("L", "TARG_NAME", "A")%>',
	VARCHAR IndicatorMode = 'N',
	VARCHAR OpenMode = 'Write',
	 <%if (odiRef.getTargetTable("FILE_FORMAT").equals("F")) {
	%>VARCHAR Format = 'Text'<%} else {%>
	VARCHAR Format = 'Delimited',
	VARCHAR TextDelimiter = '<%=odiRef.getTargetTable("SFILE_SEP_FIELD")%>'<%}; %>
);
DEFINE OPERATOR ExportOperator
DESCRIPTION 'TERADATA PARALLEL TRANSPORTER EXPORT OPERATOR'
TYPE EXPORT
SCHEMA TargetFile
ATTRIBUTES
(
	VARCHAR PrivateLogName,
	INTEGER MaxSessions = <%=odiRef.getOption("SESSIONS")%>,
	VARCHAR TdpId = '<%=odiRef.getInfo("SRC_DSERV_NAME")%>',
	VARCHAR UserName = '<%=odiRef.getInfo("SRC_USER_NAME")%>',
	VARCHAR UserPassword = '<%=odiRef.getInfo("SRC_PASS")%>',
	VARCHAR AccountId,
	VARCHAR SelectStmt = 'SELECT <%=odiRef.getPop("DISTINCT_ROWS") %>

<%if (odiRef.getTargetTable("FILE_FORMAT").equals("F")) {
	%><%=odiRef.getColList("", "\t[EXPRESSION]\t<?=FormatTranslator.translate(\u0022(FORMAT '\u0022, \u0022[DEST_DT]\u0022, \u0022[COL_FORMAT]\u0022.trim(), \u0022') \u0022)?> (char([BYTES])) \t[COL_NAME]", ",\n", "", "INS").replaceAll("'", "''") %>
<%} else { 
	%><%=odiRef.getColList("", "\t[EXPRESSION]\t<?=FormatTranslator.translate(\u0022(FORMAT '\u0022, \u0022[DEST_DT]\u0022, \u0022[COL_FORMAT]\u0022.trim(), \u0022') \u0022)?> (varchar([BYTES])) \t[COL_NAME]", ",\n", "", "INS").replaceAll("'", "''") %>
<%};%>
     
FROM <%=odiRef.getFrom() %>    
<% {s="where	(1=1)";
s+=(char)10+odiRef.getJoin().replaceAll("'", "''");
s+=(char)10+odiRef.getFilter().replaceAll("'", "''");
s+=(char)10+odiRef.getJrnFilter().replaceAll("'", "''");
/* For Performance: suppress where clause, if empty */ 
if (!s.trim().equals("where	(1=1)")) {out.print(s);}; };%>
<%=odiRef.getGrpBy().replaceAll("'", "''") %>      
<%=odiRef.getHaving().replaceAll("'", "''") %>       
       '
);

STEP export_to_file
(
	APPLY TO OPERATOR ( FileWriter )
	SELECT * FROM OPERATOR ( ExportOperator [1] );
);

);
<%}%>

import os
logname = r'''<%=odiRef.getTargetTable("WORK_SCHEMA")%>/<%=odiRef.getTargetTable("RES_NAME")%>.log''' scriptname = r'''<%=odiRef.getTargetTable("WORK_SCHEMA")%>/<%=odiRef.getTargetTable("RES_NAME")%>.script'''
utility = r"""<% if (odiRef.getOption( "TERADATA_UTILITY" ).equals( "FEXP" )) { %>fexp < "%s" > "%s" <% } else { %>tbuild -f "%s" > "%s" <%};%> """ loadcmd = utility % (scriptname, logname)
if os.system(loadcmd) <> 0 : raise "Unload Error", "See %s for details" % logname
